text: Anyone else noticing how some default HubSpot modules are creating duplicate id's? I'm on a page with the Accordion module (granted, not default, but it's from HubSpot on the module marketplace) and each item in the accordion has a div with the same ID. Same thing is happening with the navigation module. Got 2 nav modules on a page with the same ID. Axe isn't liking it
I had an ID field in there
nvm correction. I have an id field in there in my company’s version of it, but that one doesn’t have one by default.
Thanks Jon, might have to make some changes to our pages then. I'll check with HubSpot too....because I'd rather not have to switch out all accordions if I don't have to
since those are vast ones you might be able to edit the modules themselves
